entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 31 December 2022
